title: Plat Team LF Mid and Jungler
body: Prefer plat but happy to trial anyone this weekend. Must be able to play all clash games. Add me in game ‘Odell’

replies.body: Hey Man! Im a Junle main and have a Mid lane friend. Both of us are Silver 2 as we have only just gotten back into league. I peaked G1 he peaked P5 when we used to play, add jumanjiji if you're keen for us to join! Haven't been online on that account in a while, but dont stress I've been playing on an alt so i'm not rusty :)
